Monthly Sales Report - December 2024

Executive Summary:
This month showed strong performance across all product categories. Total revenue increased by fifteen percent compared to November, driven primarily by holiday promotions and new product launches.

Key Metrics:
Total Revenue: Two hundred fifty thousand dollars
New Customers: Three hundred twenty
Customer Retention Rate: Eighty seven percent
Average Order Value: One hundred twelve dollars

Regional Performance:
The Northeast region led sales with forty percent of total revenue, followed by the West Coast at thirty percent. The Southeast and Midwest regions each contributed fifteen percent respectively.

Recommendations:
Based on these results, we recommend increasing inventory for top performing products and expanding marketing efforts in underperforming regions during the first quarter of next year.
